tool_description: Tracks and records individual prayer session completion, duration, and user experience feedback.

session_id.description: Unique identifier for the prayer session

prayer_name.description: Name of the prayer or meditation performed

start_time.description: Session start time in ISO 8601 format

end_time.description: Session end time in ISO 8601 format

completion_status.description: Session completion: completed, interrupted, skipped, partial

notes.description: Personal notes or reflections from the session

distractions.description: Types of distractions experienced during session

error_messages: Invalid session times: start_time must be before end_time
Invalid time format: Use ISO 8601 format for start_time and end_time
Invalid completion status: Use one of [completed, interrupted, skipped, partial]
Invalid rating range: focus_rating and spiritual_satisfaction must be between 1 and 10
Session too long: Sessions longer than 4 hours may indicate an error
usage: Provide session ID, prayer name, start/end times, and completion status. Optionally add quality ratings, notes, location, and distraction information. Returns tracking confirmation with session summary.

tracking_id.description: Unique identifier for the tracking record
